Package it.polimi.se2019.network

Interface EventUpdater

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventUpdaterRMI, EventUpdaterSocket
    public interface EventUpdater
    Sender interface used by the view to send chosen events to controller. View does not know what methods really do, only the network implementation knows what to do, transforming sendEvent to correspondent receiveEvent

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean login​(View view, java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String password, boolean existingGame, java.lang.String mode)
      Login to controller Calling other methods before login may throw an exception
      void sendAck()
      Sends an ack to notifies the server of being online.
      void sendAction​(java.lang.String action)
      Sends the chosen action that need to be executed.
      void sendAmmo​(java.lang.String ammo)
      Sends ammo used to pay a special cost.
      void sendDirection​(java.lang.String direction)
      Sends direction the player wants to target
      void sendEffect​(java.lang.String effect)
      Sends effect to activate related to the current weapon
      void sendPlayers​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> players)
      Sends a list of players that will be targets of the current effect
      void sendPowerUp​(java.util.List<ViewPowerUp> powerUp, boolean discard)
      Sends a list of powerups that will be chosen.
      void sendRoom​(java.lang.String room)
      Sends the chosen room for the current effect.
      void sendStop()
      Sends a stop action, resetting or reversing the current state.
      void sendTiles​(java.util.List<ViewTileCoords> tiles)
      Sends the chosen tiles for the current effect
      void sendWeapon​(java.lang.String weapon)
      Sends the chosen weapon to use in a shoot action.

      • login

        boolean login​(View view,
              java.lang.String nickname,
              java.lang.String password,
              boolean existingGame,
              java.lang.String mode)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Login to controller Calling other methods before login may throw an exception
        Parameters:
        view - view that should receive updates from the server
        nickname - username of the connecting player
        password - password of the connecting player
        existingGame - true if the player is reconnecting, false if the player wants to join a new match
        mode - game mode (normal/domination)
        Returns:
        true if login to server has been successful
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
